A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Personally I think this is a great movie. Interesting twists you don’t see coming\, something fresh after the enjoyable but ultimately unoriginal force awakens. My only real gripes are the Leia in space scene and the fact we don’t really learn anything about snoke. Is it better than empire or a new hope? Probably not\, but to have a user score anywhere near the level of the prequel movies is just plain ridiculous
